Present location: BIBLIOTHECA ALEXANDRINA ANTIQUETIES MUSEUM [01/027] ALEXANDRIA BAAM
Name: Slab with a Woman and Three kids
Description: A sandstone slab showing a woman lying on one side; on the upper section, there is a rectangular frame containing three naked children facing forward. There is an aureole in the upper portion of the rectangle and round the head of the woman. The woman is resting with her left arm on a couch and her right arm extends further than her right knee. The artist tried with some success to indicate the feminine physical parts of the woman.
